item.title: IBN
item.description: score:205 Chances: ICICI Bank’s fiscal third-quarter results reflect a rise in revenues, solid loans and deposit balances, and reduced provisions, amid elevated expenses. Efforts to bolster fee income, dependence on domestic loans and digitization of banking services will keep supporting ICICI Bank’s financials.

item.title: NU
